name: user-manager
title: User Manager ACE
shortDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension (ACE) shows the manager of the currently logged in user.
longDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension (ACE) shows the manager of the currently logged in user. It uses the Microsoft Graph to get the manager of the user and then displays it.
